rooms.description: A spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light. Vastu principles: main entrance positioned to the south-east and window placement optimized for energy flow.
An efficient kitchen space with open design adjoining the living area. Appliances are arranged in compliance with Vastu principles and natural ventilation is prioritized via windows on one side.
A private bedroom ensuring a sense of calm and comfort; designed with floor-to-ceiling windows for morning sunlight aligning with Vastu recommendations.
Compact yet functional bathroom adjacent to the bedroom. Windows are minimally used here in compliance with privacy and safety norms.
